eUKhost Linux VPS Hosting | 50% OFF @ £11/mo | 30 Day Money Back | 24x7 Support

eUKhost Limited brings to you very affordable Linux VPS Hosting services with great features. We have revamped our plans to pack in more features at even more affordable prices.

We are giving away first two months at 50% off on any billing cycle and if you choose to pay on a month to month basis, we'll take 50% off the first two invoices you pay; and for any other billing cycles, we'll give you the equivalent of two months off.

Check out our All New Linux VPS Plans:

We offer monthly, quarterly and annual billing options on all servers with 24 x 7 e-mail, live chat and phone support included as standard. Call us on 0800 862 0380 or Visit our Website: http://www.eukhost.com or Email us on Sales@eukhost.com.
